data.title: Post-OIB degree - Top University Destinations
data.meta_description: American Section students, fully bilingual and armed with the OIB baccalaureate degree, gain acceptance at top universities worldwide. Learn more here.
data.text:
University Destinations

Armed with a fully bilingual education and a prestigious degree, graduates from the American Section at Lycée International gain acceptance at some of the most prestigious universities around the world.

Over the past three years, roughly 50% of our graduates matriculate abroad, most often to North America or Great Britain, while other half have stayed in France or enrolled in the growing number of Anglophone courses offered in continental Europe. Dual-degree programs, such as those with l’Institut des Sciences Politiques (‘Sciences Po’), are also popular.
